mean_en: a set of political and economic theories based on the belief that everyone has an equal right to a share of a country’s wealth and that the government should own and control the main industries
sentence: The hammer and sickle represents socialism. Workers, unite!
sentence_trans: 锤头和镰刀代表了社会主义。工人们，团结起来！
word_etyma: soc社会 + ial...的 + ism主义 → socialism社会主义
